meanings.definition: Anthropology: the study of human societies and cultures
meanings.sent1: In anthro class, we learn about different cultures around the world.
meanings.sent2: She decided to major in anthro to understand people better.
meanings.sent3: The anthro professor made learning about ancient civilizations fun.
meanings.sent4: Her love for anthro made her appreciate diversity even more.
meanings.sent5: The field of anthro helps us understand how societies evolve over time.

meanings.definition: Anthropocentric: considering humans as the most important element of existence
meanings.sent1: His anthro view placed human needs above all other concerns.
meanings.sent2: The company's anthro policies focused solely on human benefits.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing how his anthro perspective ignored the impact on nature.
meanings.sent4: Her anthro approach to problem-solving prioritized human happiness.
meanings.sent5: The anthro belief that humans are superior can lead to conflicts with nature.
